name: Amherst College
details: Amherst College is "need blind" for all international students and meets 100% of demonstrated need.

name: Babson College
details: Need-based financial aid plus several full tuition scholarships: Global Scholarship,  Diversity Leadership Award,  Weissman Scholarship,  Arthur M. Blank Scholarship

name: Bard College
details: Need Aware Full Tuition Financial Aid (only for "international student who can demonstrate sufficient funding to cover room, board and travel costs").

name: Barnard College (Women's Only College)
details: Barnard College awards a small number of need-based scholarships for international students in each first-year entering class.

name: Barry University
details: The Barry Stamps Scholars Program provides full tuition and room and board over four years, plus funds for study abroad, undergraduate research, and other exceptional learning experiences.

name: Bates College
details: Bates meets the full demonstrated financial need for all admitted students.

name: Bennington College
details: Need-based financial aid + Merit Scholarships (Presidential Scholarship)

name: Berea College
details: Financial aid and Scholarships cover all the costs of tuition, room, board, and fees.

name: Bowdoin College
details: Bowdoin meets all admitted international students' full demonstrated need with a small on-campus work expectation and scholarships.

name: Brown University
details: Brown meets full demonstrated need for students who are admitted. Brown will be need-blind for international students beginning with the Class of 2029.

name: Bryn Mawr College (Women's Only College)
details: Bryn Mawr Grant (need-based aid) + Merit Scholarships (Bryn Mawr Presidential Scholarship, Bryn Mawr Merit Scholarship).

name: Caltech
details: Need based "gift aid" + Work-Study Program.

name: Carleton College
details: Carleton meets 100 percent of every studentâ€™s demonstrated need through need-based grants.

name: Case Western Reserve University
details: Need-based aid + Scholarships (unsure if full-ride is available).

name: Claremont McKenna College
details: CMC meets 100% of demonstrated financial need of all admitted students using grants, merit-based scholarships and College Work-Study Program.

name: Clark University
details: Presidential Scholarship: Approximately five exceptional students annually are awarded full tuition, as well as on-campus housing and meals for all four years.

name: Colby College
details: Colby meets 100 percent of demonstrated need for all admitted students, including international students.

name: Colgate University
details: Colgate meets 100% of every international student's demonstrated financial need. It is also free for international applicants to apply to Colgate.

name: Colorado College
details: Colorado College meets 100% of your family's eligibility for need-based financial aid.

name: Columbia University
details: Columbia meets 100% of the demonstrated financial need for all international students admitted with funding.

name: Connecticut College
details: ConnColl meets the full demonstrated need of every admitted student.

name: Cornell University
details: Cornell meets 100 percent of admitted international undergraduates' demonstrated financial need.

name: Dartmouth College
details: Dartmouth guarantees to meet 100% of the demonstrated need of all admitted students who apply for aid, regardless of citizenship. Need-blind for all international students.

name: Davidson College
details: James B. Duke Scholarship: Awarded to five students each year that covers full tuition and fees plus a $5,000 stipend.

name: DePauw University
details: Rector Scholarship - Full Tuition, Merit Scholarships - Up to $40k, Need-based aid.

name: Drexel University
details: The Drexel Global Scholar program recognizes a select number of incoming international students with exceptional academic achievement and outstanding commitment to global leadership and international community building.

name: Duke University
details: The Robertson Scholars Leadership Program provides eight semesters of full tuition, room and board, and most mandatory fees for Scholars at Duke University. Scholars also have access to generous funding for up to three summer experiences, funding for conferences throughout the academic year, and for two semesters of study abroad. Duke also offers need-based financial aid to international students.

name: Emory University
details: The Robert W. Woodruff Scholarship seeks "individuals who are motivated to be agents of positive social change across the broad spectrum of society". The scholarship includes full tuition, fees, and on-campus room and meals.

name: Florida International University
details: Presidential Premier Scholarship - Students with 4.0 GPA and 1370 SAT / or 30 ACT are awarded 100% tuition and fees plus a book stipend. Make sure to apply before October 23.

name: Franklin & Marshall College
details: Need-based aid + Merit Scholarships. Need-based and merit-based financial aid is not mutually exclusive; you can qualify and receive both. If youâ€™re admitted to F&M, they will meet 100% of your institutionally determined financial need for all four years on campus.

name: Furman University
details: The James B. Duke scholarship covers tuition, room, board, and all fees for four years or eight semesters.

name: Gettysburg College
details: Gettysburg meets the demonstrated financial need for all admitted international students.

name: Grinnell College
details: Grinnell is committed to meeting 100% of institutionally determined need for all admitted international students.

name: Hamilton College
details: Hamilton meets the full demonstrated financial need of every admitted international student for all four years.

name: Hampshire College
details: International Scholar Award - One international student each year will receive full ride scholarship, and two international students will receive full tuition scholarship.

name: Harvard University
details: Harvard has a need-blind admissions policy that meets the full need of all international students.

name: Harvey Mudd College
details: Harvey Mudd College provides need-based financial aid in the form of the International Student Scholarship. Additional merit scholarships are also available.

name: Hendrix College
details: Hays Memorial Scholarship: Awarded to four entering students each year, provides full tuition, room, board, and mandatory fees for four years of study at Hendrix. Make sure to apply by November 15.

name: Haverford College
details: Haverford meets 100% of the demonstrated need of all admitted international students.

name: Indiana University Bloomington
details: The Wells Scholars Program guarantees the full cost of attendance including, tuition fees, as well as a living stipend to cover the cost of a standard double dorm room contract and a standard meal plan in the residence halls. Make sure to apply before November 1.

name: Johns Hopkins University
details: JHU meets 100% of a family's demonstrated need without loans for all admitted international citizens.

name: Kenyon College
details: Kenyon meets 100% of demonstrated financial need for all four years of the college experience.

name: Lafayette College
details: Lafayette guarantees to meet 100% of admitted and enrolled studentsâ€™ demonstrated financial need.

name: Lehigh University
details: Lehighâ€™s Soaring Together Scholarship Program provides full-tuition merit scholarshipsâ€”along with experiential learning opportunities, alumni support and career and professional developmentâ€”in celebration of 50 years of Lehigh women and coeducation at Lehigh. Additional need-based aid is also available to international students.

name: Massachusetts Institute of Technology
details: MIT is committed to meeting 100% of demonstrated financial need for international students just as we are for domestic students.

name: Miami University
details: Presidential Fellows Program scholarship package will cover tuition, fees, housing, and food for 15 students each year. Make sure to apply before December 1.

name: Middlebury College
details: Middlebury meets 100% of the demonstrated financial need of any student we admit, U.S. or international.

name: New York University
details: NYU will meet 100% demonstrated need of all admitted stuents.

name: Northwestern University
details: Northwestern meets 100% of a studentâ€™s demonstrated financial need.

name: Oberlin College
details: Oberlin provides grants, scholarships, loans, and on-campus employment to enable international students to meet all demonstrated financial need.

name: Pitzer College
details: If admitted, Pitzer will meet 100% of your demonstrated need with work-study and a Pitzer need-based scholarship.

name: Pomona College
details: Pomona College is committed to meeting the full demonstrated need for all international students that apply for financial aid at the time of admission.

name: Princeton University
details: Princeton has a need-blind admissions policy, which meets the need of all admitted international students.

name: Reed College
details: Reed meets 100 percent of demonstrated need with various types of aid for all admitted students for all four years.

name: Rhodes College
details: Rhodes meets the demonstrated financial need of international students. Additionally, there are merit-based scholarships ranging from US $10k to $40k.

name: Rice University
details: International students who receive need-based aid will have 100% of demonstrated need met with institutional grant aid.

name: Riders University
details: Rider University's full-tuition Trustee Scholarship offers 10 eligible applicants a tuition-free four years at Rider. Make sure to apply before November 15.

name: Scripps College (Women's Only College)
details: Scripps meets 100% of a studentâ€™s institutionally determined financial need.

name: Sewanee The University of the South
details: Sewanee awards 10 Global Scholarships to admitted international applicants each year. Global Scholars are awarded the direct costs of tuition, room, board, and fees for four consecutive years of study at Sewanee.

name: Skidmore College
details: Each year, Skidmore College provides a few international students with need-based financial aid awards.

name: Smith College (Women's Only College)
details: Smith will meet the full documented need, as determined by college policy, of all admitted students.

name: Stanford University
details: Stanford is committed to meeting demonstrated financial need for all admitted students (regardless of citizenship) who have requested financial aid during the application process.

name: Stetson University
details: The J. Ollie Edmunds Distinguished Scholarship program pays all expenses for four years at Stetson for students who exhibit exemplary academic and personal leadership. Make sure to apply before December 1.

name: Swarthmore College
details: Regardless of citizenship, Swarthmore meets 100% of institutionally determined financial need up to â€” and including â€” full annual tuition (with annual $750 book allowance), fees, room, board (meal plan), academic supplies, and personal expenses.

name: Temple University
details: Temple University offers merit scholarships to international students with strong academic records. For first-year students, these awards range from $2000 to full tuition.

name: Trinity College
details: Trinity College will meet your full, demonstrated need.

name: Tufts University
details: Tufts proudly meets 100% of the demonstrated financial need of every admitted student, regardless of citizenship.

name: University of Alabama
details: The Academic Elite Scholarships is awarded to eight students each year. Academic elite scholars will receive full tuition and one year of on campus housing.

name: University of Chicago
details: UChicago is committed to meeting 100% of your demonstrated need with a loan-free financial aid package if you are admitted and applied for funding.

name: University of Houston
details: UH Tier One Scholarship recipients will recieve all tuition and mandatory fees for four years of undergraduate studies and on-campus housing and meal plan for the first two years at UH. Make sure to apply before November 1.

name: University of Kentucky
details: Each year UK offers 25 students the Otis A. Singletary Scholarship. Singletary Scholars receive full tuition for four years and a two-year housing stipend. Make sure to apply before Demeber 1.

name: University of Maryland
details: The Banneker/Key is the University of Marylandâ€™s most prestigious scholarship. The full Banneker/Key provides full tuition, room, board, and a book allowance. Make sure to apply before November 1.

name: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
details: The Robertson Scholars Leadership Program provides eight semesters of full tuition, room and board, and most mandatory fees for Scholars at UNC-Chapel Hill. Scholars also have access to generous funding for up to three summer experiences, funding for conferences throughout the academic year, and for two semesters of study abroad.

name: University of Notre Dame
details: Notre Dame Stamps Scholars Program covers tuition and fees as well as the estimated cost of books, personal expenses, and transportation for up to four years of undergraduate study. Additionally, need-based aid is also available for international students.

name: University of Pennsylvania
details: UPenn commits to meet 100% of international students' demonstrated need with grant funds and work-study, just like any other undergraduate student.

name: University of Richmond
details: The Richmond Scholars Program recipients recieve full tuition plus food and housing. Scholars are defined by academic achievement, engaged leadership, strong sense of purpose, and investment in a diverse and inclusive campus community. Make sure to apply before December 1.

name: University of Rochester
details: The University of Rochester offers need-based financial aid to international undergraduate students.

name: University of Southern California
details: Each year, around 100 students recieve the USC Trustee Scholarship which includes full tuition. Make sure to apply before November 1.

name: University of Southern Mississippi
details: Students with a SAT score of 1360-1440 can expect to recieve the Academic Excellence Scholarship, which includes full value of tuition. Alongside, students with a SAT score more than 1450 can also get the Freshman Academic Housing Scholarship, which covers housing for the first year.

name: University of Texas at Arlington
details: Presidential Honors Scholarship: 13k per year with 1500+ SAT (full tuiton), Presidential Scholarsip: 10k per year with 1400+ SAT. Make sure to apply before December 1.

name: University of Texas at Dallas
details: The Eugene McDermott Scholars Program (EMSP) is a full-ride undergraduate merit scholarship program open to domestic and international students in all majors. Around 20 McDermott Scholarships are awarded each year. Make sure to apply before November 1.

name: University of Wisconsin-Madison
details: The King-Morgridge Scholars Program: Selected scholars will receive a full-time, four-year/eight-semester scholarship to the University of Wisconsinâ€“Madison that includes tuition and fees, on-campus room and board, health insurance, airfare, and a stipend for miscellaneous expenses.

name: Vanderbilt University
details: Vanderbilt University offers need-based scholarships to a limited number of international undergraduate applicants. Additionally, the Ingram Scholars Program offers a full ride and the Cornelius Vanderbilt Scholarship and Chancellor's Scholarship recipients get full tuition.

name: Vassar College
details: Vassar meets 100% of each studentâ€™s demonstrated financial need with a personalized award package.

name: Villanova University
details: Presidential Scholarship: A renewable, merit-based award covering full tuition, on-campus housing, a meal plan that includes up to 21 meals per week, the general fee, and the cost of textbooks. Twenty-five Presidential Scholarships are offered annually.

name: Wabash College
details: Trustee International Scholarships: Merit-based scholarship which covers tuition, fees, and on-campus housing and food. (Health insurance, books, supplies, and personal expenses are not covered by this scholarship.)  Make sure to apply before December 1.

name: Wake Forest University
details: Several full ride merit-based scholarships: Guy T. Carswell Scholarship, Joseph G. Gordon scholarship, Graylyn Scholarship, Leadership and Character Scholarship, Nancy Susan Reynolds Scholarship, Stamps Scholarship.

name: Washington and Lee University
details: The Johnson Scholarship: Johnson Scholarships cover tuition and fees, housing and food, and $10,000 in funding for a summer experience â€” a grand total of more than $83,000 per year.

name: Washington University in St. Louis
details: WashU is committed to meeting 100 percent of demonstrated financial need for all admitted students.

name: Wellesley College (Women's Only College)
details: Wellesley is committed to meeting 100% of calculated need for all admitted international citizens who have applied for financial aid during the admission process.

name: Wesleyan University
details: Wesleyan will meet 100% of your demonstrated financial need.

name: Whitman College
details: Whitman will meet 100% of demonstrated need for international students who are offered admission.

name: Williams College
details: Financial aid awards for international students at Williams are comprehensive, guaranteed for all four years, and meet 100% of demonstrated need.

name: Yale University
details: Yale operates a need-blind admissions policy for all applicants, regardless of citizenship or immigration status and meets 100% need of all admitted students.
